newsletter.subscriptionCheckbox: I would like to be informed about current trends, offers and vouchers by email. Can be canceled free of charge at any time.
newsletter.subscriptionInformation: You will receive information about offers from Asambeauty GmbH by email. You can object to the sending at any time. You can find all information about data protection in our data protection regulations .
newsletter.subscriptionInfo: We just sent you an email at {email}. Click on the link inside to confirm your registration.

messages.newsletterSubscribed: Thank you! We have signed up your address.

newsletter.legalInformation: By clicking the “Register” button, I would like to be regularly informed by email about selected offers and products from ASAMBEAUTY. You can unsubscribe at any time via the customer account and the newsletter (both to revoke this advertising consent and to declare an objection to advertising). The only costs for this are transmission costs according to the basic tariffs. Please note our General Terms and Conditions and Data Protection Policy.

newsletter.birthdaySurprise: Pssst... Receive an annual surprise for your birthday!

code.label: Code
code.shortDescription: Valid on a shopping cart from 35 €.
code.longDescription: Voucher code can only be redeemed once per customer up to 4 weeks after receiving the email for purchases of €35 or more. </br></br>Cannot be combined with other promotions or vouchers. Not valid for the SALE category. Cash payment or subsequent crediting is not possible. Commercial publication of the voucher code (e.g. on voucher websites or blogs) is not permitted.
